response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe will greatly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and quality, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $9,500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
